MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.11pm. Our engineers have arrived at the North Street Substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:15pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:27pm on Monday, 11 January 2021
